catalog.name: WACCM-X Simulations for November 2020 to December 2021

dataset.name: WACCM-X Simulations for November 2020 to December 2021

documentation.xlink:title: NCAR GDEX - WACCM-X Simulations for November 2020 to December 2021(d583127)

metadata.documentation: The dataset contains simulation output for the time period from November 2020 to December 2021 that is in support of the publication "Quasi 6-Day Planetary Wave Oscillations in Equatorial Plasma Irregularities". The output is from three different simulations in the Whole Atmosphere Community Climate Model with thermosphere-ionosphere eXtension (WACCM-X). The three simulations are: realistic lower atmosphere and solar/geomagnetic variability, realistic lower atmosphere and constant solar/geomagnetic activity; and climatological lower atmosphere with variable solar/geomagnetic activity.
